opinion.posture: Petition for post-conviction hearing. Appeal, No. 892, Oct. T., 1967, from order of Court of Quarter Sessions of Philadelphia County, June T., 1959, No. 294, opinion by SMITH, JR., J. Submitted September 11, 1967.
opinion.attorneys: Clem Bruce, appellant, in propria persona; Alan J. Davis, Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
